owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payee(uint256).details: Getter for the address of the payee number `index`.

release(address).details: Triggers a transfer to `account` of the amount of Ether they are owed, according to their percentage of the total shares and their previous withdrawals.

released(address).details: Getter for the amount of Ether already released to a payee.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

shares(address).details: Getter for the amount of shares held by an account.

totalReleased().details: Getter for the total amount of Ether already released.

totalShares().details: Getter for the total shares held by payees.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

slottingFee(uint32).notice: Get slotting fee given generator type

typeToGenerator(uint32).notice: Map type index to generator address
